name: AddClientPreferences
description:
Use this request to include client preferences information to a given shopping cart.

The [orderForm](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/orderform-fields) is the data structure which represents a shopping cart and contains all information pertaining to it. Hence, the `orderFormId` is the identification code of a given cart.

> This request has a time out of 12 seconds.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

orderFormId.description: ID of the orderForm that will receive client profile information.

locale.description: Locale chosen by the shopper. Determines website language.

optinNewsLetter.description: Indicates whether the shopper opted in to receive the store's news letter.
